title.narrative: Uganda: Albertine Region Sustainable Development Project

description.narrative: To improve regional and local access to infrastructure, markets, and skills development in the Albertine Region.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Administration of Bursaries | Description :The Recipient, through MoES, shall not later than nine (9) monthsafter the Effective Date, establish administrative arrangements for the implementation of the Bursary Scheme with a composition,mandate, terms of reference and resources satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :31-Mar-2015

Finance Agreement :Budget for Component 3(b) (Bursary Scheme) | Description :The Recipient shall, in each FY: through MoESTS,establish and thereafter maintain during the implementation of the Project, a budget line item for Eligible Expenditures under Part3(b) of the Project; and through MoFPED, allocate counterpart funds required for said Eligible Expenditures under said Part 3(b) ofthe Project until payment(s) for said Eligible Expenditures shall fall due. | Due Date : 01-Jul-2014

Finance Agreement :Internal Audit | Description: To facilitate the carrying out of internal audits under the Project, theRecipient, through MoES, MLHUD and UNRA, respectively, shall carry out semi-annual internal audit reviews and prepare relevantreports, and thereafter furnish said reports to the Association not later than forty-five (45) days after the end of the periodcovered by such reports. | Frequency :Semi Annual

Finance Agreement :RAP Compensation Budget for Component 1 (a) | Description :Recipient shall, in each FY: through UNRA, establishand thereafter maintain during the implementation of the Project, a budget line item for RAP compensation costs under Part 1(a) ofthe Project; and through MoFPED, allocate counterpart funds required for said RAP compensation costs under said Part 1(a) of theProject, until payment(s) for said RAP compensation costs shall fall due. | Due Date :01-Jul-2014

Finance Agreement :UNRA Financial Management System | Description :To facilitate the proper maintenance of its financial managementsystem, the Recipient, through UNRA, shall, not later than six (6)months after the Effective Date, upgrade its financial managementsystem. | Due Date :31-Dec-2014
